潑.definition: to splash; to spill; rough and coarse; brutish

潑冷水.definition: to pour cold water on; (fig.) to dampen sb's enthusiasm

潑出去的水.definition: spilt water; (fig.) sth that can not be retrieved; spilt milk

潑婦罵街.definition: shouting abuse in the street like a fishwife

潑水難收.definition: water once spilt cannot be retrieved (idiom); irreversible change

潑辣.definition: shrewish; pungent; forceful; bold and vigorous

潑髒水.definition: (fig.) to sling mud at; to smear; to slander
